name: Storm Spear
desc:
You hurl a spear of lightning at a target creature within range that you can see, who must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d10 lightning damage, halved on a successful saving throw.

For the duration of the spell, you can throw a second spear for 2 AP, and a third spear for 2 AP. The second spear deals 3d10 lightning damage on a failed saving throw, and the third spear deals 4d10 lightning damage on a failed saving throw. Creatures that succeed on the saving throws take half damage. The spell ends after throwing a third spear.
empower: Creates an additional spear each time, which can target a different creature.
author: CrusaderDroid
